summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 24, 2019. It documents routine institutional operations, staff leave, and inmate statuses. Most significantly, it records that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion the day before his death.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion.

persons.context: Listed as inmate #76254-054 at a local hospice with USMS guards.

events.title: Epstein on Suicide Watch
events.description: The daily report documents that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion at MCC New York.

events.title: MCC Daily Operations
events.description: Routine correctional facility activities including inmate admissions/releases, staff leave, fire watch, and equipment status reports.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
Local Hospice (where inmate Burnett was held)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was documented as being on Suicide Watch at MCC New York on July 24, 2019.
Epstein was listed as having an 'inmate companion' while on Suicide Watch.
The report indicates ongoing 'Fire Watch' procedures and notes malfunctioning doors/gates in the facility.
The document is a routine institutional log created the day before Epstein's death on July 25, 2019.
Inmate Burnett was at a local hospice under guard by the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS).
